TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CursorOnMatchHandler(object o, CursorOnMatchArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed CursorOnMatchHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the CursorOnMatchHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the CursorOnMatchHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the CursorOnMatchHandler is removed from the event.
